Reviews.Title: “On a tight budget its a good place.I advise to book sightseeing in advance rather than taking frm hotel”

Reviews.Content: windsor star hotel facilities slightly budget hotel provided clumsy fashion fair distance centre city easy bus connection book singapore package budget friendly singapore tours hotel matching price range decent offered lowest rates happy bout interiors hotel extraordinary bad carpets furniture looked decent location central connectivity nice it’s near mrt station walking distance taxi petrol station door easy stuff clean nice comfortable linen feel size slightly larger refrigerator stocked drinks tea coffee maker amenities phone tv housekeeping lot noise doing job major drawback ac centrally controlled found times cold ad windows help couple blankets arent restaurants restaurant hotel focuses buffet menu fairly limited hours little options breakfast items vegetarian price cheap package internet business center sg 430 minutes fast facilities little clumsy hope rectify nice singapore tour happy trip
